column4: hey guys, i'm having a problem with my panel. when run, it crashes. however, when run as root, it doesn't crash. please help me solve this
what does   ls -l ~/.Xauthority  say ? ( and why are you running gnome as root? )
i'm not running gnome as root, i'm running the panel as root, as when run as user it crashes.
OK that looks all right - what do you mean about running the panel as root then?
on login, the panel just crashes. so i open the panel as root in a terminal so i can function.
that sounds like asking for problems - which is why I asked about .Xauthority
have you tried just running " killall gnome-panel " as your normal user ?
any error messages if you run gnome-panel from a terminal as your user?
ughhh i don't know what to do. i'm thinking about just creating a new user and seeing if that helps. and no, there's no output, and the crash information yields nothing useful. its a segfault
yes, test with a new user
UGH lame. thanks for the help, i seem to have figured out that its just my profile.
